name: Detective Wolfrick
description:
Detective Wolfrick is a third-person perspective, point-and-click visual novel. The player is Detective Wolfrick and is tasked with solving a murder at Aurora University. Explore environments for clues, collect information, and solve puzzles. 

---

All seems quiet at Aurora University until a murder turns the school upside down.You, as Detective Wolfrick, is assigned this case. A rookie fresh out of the academy, you embark on this investigation. Guided by your partner, Gideon, you must solve the murder. Is this a random accident or is the murderer connected to someone from the university? It's up to you to find out before there's another body.

Will you catch the killer?

  • Travel to Aurora University and meet unique characters
  • Interact with a crime scene
  • Have a talking dog guide you on your first case
  • Earn a score as you progress to the end
